mention.text: Chris Patten , the last governor of Hong Kong
the last governor of Hong Kong
Chris Patten , who has been driven to the wall , to prove his loyalty to British colonialism
the end on the Hong Kong issue
Our responsibility toward the citizens of Hong Kong
real Chinese people of China rather than a conquered people in a colony
the colonialist interests of the British Empire
the interests of the British Empire
the biggest and most important component part of these relations
the biggest and most important part
Hong Kong in a dignified manner
Hong Kong in a dignified manner
a war of aggression launched by Britain against China
the return of its richest colony to China , the rightful owner
the position of Britain in China and Asia
the right word for Mr. Patten himself
